name: Fragmentary-dev
body:
#Welcome to fragmentary-dev!

##About
This repository contains EpiDoc XML versions of Ancient Greek and Latin fragmentary works/authors/texts. This work is part of the [Leipzig Open Fragmentary Texts Series (LOFTS)](http://www.dh.uni-leipzig.de/wo/projects/open-greek-and-latin-project/the-leipzig-open-fragmentary-texts-series-lofts/) at the University of Leipzig. 

These XML files were produced by data entry company [Digital Divide Data](http://www.digitaldividedata.org) (DDD) who OCR'd, corrected and encoded the text in accordance with the latest [EpiDoc](http://sourceforge.net/p/epidoc/wiki/Home/) standards. While the initial results are adequate, more can and should be done to improve the XML.

##Contents
###Ancient Greek
* _[Comicorum Atticorum Fragmenta, Vol. 1](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/fragmentary-dev/blob/master/comicorumAtticorum_1.xml)_ (1880) ed. Theodor Kock. Lipsiae: In Aedibis B.G. Teubneri.
* _[Comicorum Atticorum Fragmenta, Vol. 2](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/misc-dev/blob/master/comicorumAtticorum_2.xml)_ (1884) ed. Theodor Kock. Lipsiae: In Aedibis B.G. Teubneri.
* _[Die Fragmente der Vorsokratiker, Vol. 2](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/fragmentary-dev/blob/master/fragmenteVorsokratiker_2.xml)_ (1912) ed. Hermann Alexander Diels. Berlin: Weidmannsche Buchhandlung.
* _[Storicorum Veterum Fragmenta, Vol. 1](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/fragmentary-dev/blob/master/stoicorumVeterum_1.xml)_ (1964) ed. Hans Friedrich August von Arnim. Stutgardiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.
* _[Storicorum Veterum Fragmenta, Vol. 2](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/fragmentary-dev/blob/master/stoicorumVeterum_2.xml)_ (1964) ed. Hans Friedrich August von Arnim. Stutgardiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.
* _[Storicorum Veterum Fragmenta, Vol. 3]()_ () ed. Hans Friedrich August von Arnim. Stutgardiae: In Aedibus B.G. Teubneri.

###Latin
* _[Historicorum Romanorum Reliquiae, Vol. 1](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/fragmentary-dev/blob/master/romanorumReliquiae_1.xml)_ (1914) ed. Hermann Peter. Lipsiae: In Aedibis B.G. Teubneri.
* _[Historicorum Romanorum Reliquiae, Vol. 2](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/fragmentary-dev/blob/master/romanorumReliquiae_2.xml)_ (1906) ed. Hermann Peter. Lipsiae: In Aedibis B.G. Teubneri.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
